name: Nothing
description: You have nothing in your hands. You should probably find something to defend yourself with

name: Dagger
description: A small blade, probably made of iron. Keep the sharp end away from your body.

name: Rat Claw
description: A small claw, probably from a rat. It's not very sharp.

name: Royal Rat Claw
description: A larger, sharper claw from a Rat King.

name: Giant Royal Claw
description: An enormous claw from a Giant Rat King.

name: Divine Rat Claw
description: A glowing claw infused with divine rat energy.
